name: Dungeon Knight (arido)
description:
How far are you gonna get?

Try to get as far into the dungeon as you can. Defeat all enemies in one room to get to the next.  Every time you clear 10 rooms, a boss fight awaits you.

Controls

Movement:WASD
Attack: left-Mouse 
Pause: escape 

If you encounter any problems, please contact me. I would be happy about any feedback.

Credits

Tiles, Enemys and Character  - https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii

Changes
  • speed of movement lowered.
  • attack animation changed.
  • added trail to the Sword.
